title: Brainstorm Game Ideas
description: Generate several platformer game concepts, including themes, characters, and core mechanics.

title: Choose a Game Engine
description: Research and select a game engine suitable for 2D platformers (e.g., Unity, GameMaker Studio 2, Godot).

title: Learn the Basics of Chosen Engine
description: Follow tutorials to understand the engine's interface, scripting, and asset management.

title: Design Core Mechanics
description: Define player movement, jumping, and other key interactions.

title: Create Basic Player Character
description: Design and implement a simple sprite or model for the main character.

title: Implement Player Movement
description: Code the player's movement script, including walking, running, and jumping.

title: Design First Level
description: Sketch out the layout of the first level, considering challenges and pacing.

title: Create Level Assets
description: Develop basic tiles and environmental objects for the first level.

title: Build First Level
description: Assemble the first level using the created assets.

title: Test Player Movement in Level
description: Playtest the game and adjust player movement, level design, and difficulty.
